## collapsibleState variable

An object representing the state of a collapsible element.

 {<!-- -->string<!-- -->} collapse - The state when the element is collapsed.  {<!-- -->string<!-- -->} expanded - The state when the element is expanded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
collapsibleState: {
    collapse: import("@angular/animations").AnimationStateMetadata;
    expanded: import("@angular/animations").AnimationStateMetadata;
}
```
